pagespeedonline.description: The PageSpeed Insights API lets you analyze the performance of your website with a simple API. It offers tailored suggestions for how you can optimize your site, and lets you easily integrate PageSpeed Insights analysis into your development tools and workflow.

dependent.description: Runs PageSpeed analysis on the page at the specified URL, and returns PageSpeed scores, a list of suggestions to make that page faster, and other information.

captchaToken.description: The captcha token passed when filling out a captcha.

category.description: A Lighthouse category to run; if none are given, only Performance category will be run

locale.description: The locale used to localize formatted results

strategy.description: The analysis strategy (desktop or mobile) to use, and desktop is the default

pagespeedonline.title: PageSpeed Insights API
